index.title: Discover the Best Parks and Stores
index.subtitle: Explore your city with our interactive map
index.description: Our website provides detailed information about parks, shops and more. Register now to enjoy exclusive discounts and other benefits. With our party system, you can easily organize parties in parks and other locations. Join us today!

features.title: features
features.subtitle: Explore the exciting features
features.description: Discover how our professional website can enhance your experiences and make party planning a breeze.

1.title: Interactive Map
1.description: Our interactive map allows you to easily find parks, shops and other locations. You can also use it to plan your route and find the best way to get to your destination.

2.title: Member Discounts
2.description: Enjoy exclusive discounts and special offers from partner stores when you become a member.

3.title: Party System
3.description: Plan and organize elusive parties in parks and other venues with our convenient party system.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subdescription: Choose the perfect plan for your needs

free.title: Free
free.description: Get free access to the main features of the site
free.1: View information about parks, shops and other locations
free.2: Get discounts and special offers when you sign up
free.3: Organize parties in parks and other places
free.4: Limited access to the party system

basic.title: BASIC
basic.description: Unlock additional features and benefits with the basic plan
basic.1: All the features of the FREE plan
basic.2: Access premium information about parks, shops and locations
basic.3: Enhanced discounts and exclusive offers for members
basic.4: Full access to the party system with advanced party tools

pro.title: PRO
pro.description: Get the ultimate experience with the professional design
pro.1: All the features of the BASIC plan
pro.2: Priority access to new park and store information
pro.3: VIP discounts and exclusive benefits for registered members

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some of the most common questions we receive.

q1.answer: The purpose of this website is to provide information about parks, shops and other locations, and to offer discounts and benefits to registered members.
q1.question: What is the purpose of this website?

q2.answer: The map will show information about parks, shops and other points of interest. Users can easily find details such as location, hours of operation and user reviews.
q2.question: What kind of information will be available on the map?

q3.answer: To register as a member, simply click the 'Register' button on the website and fill in the required details. Once you sign up, you'll have access to discounts and other benefits.
q3.question: How do I register as a member?

q4.answer: Members will have access to exclusive discounts at participating stores and venues. In addition, they can enjoy special offers for organizing parties in parks and other locations.
q4.question: What discounts and benefits are available to members?

q5.answer: Our site provides a party system that allows you to easily organize parties in parks and other locations. Just select the desired location, choose a date and time and invite your friends. You can also customize party details such as themes and activities.
q5.question: How do I organize a party in a park or other location?
